interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 24K Gold Under Eye Mask– 20 Pairs- Under Eye Patches with Face Massager Roller, Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid Collagen Eye Masks for Dark Circles and Puffiness Dark Under Eyes Treatment Review Date: 2020/09/05 Store: FRLEDM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 6.8 x 1.1 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '616985543564', 'Manufacturer': 'FRLEDM'} Review Text: I love using eye masks, so I got this, because there were 20 pairs in the box, which is a really good deal for the price. I also liked the ingredients listed. But after receiving this, I'm a little disappointed, because it says, "Main Ingredients" and it doesn't have a list of all the ingredients anywhere. So, I do wonder what else is in these.

Saying that - these stay on well, didn't bother my skin left my eye area soft. So, yes, a list of ingredients would've been nice, but I like them anyway.

As far as the vibrating facial massager wand - I didn't expect to use it, because I use stone rollers and stones on my face, but I can see this helping with lymphatic and sinus drainage, so I'll keep it on hand for that. It's actually a pretty nifty little gadget that takes a normal sized battery (and comes with it), so I kind of like it. :) Review Title: Great value for good eye masks. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** Eye care, particularly under-eye treatments such as masks.
- **Value Seeker:** Prefers products that offer good value for money, as evidenced by purchasing items in bulk (20 pairs).
- **Ingredient Consciousness:** Values transparency in product ingredients and expresses concern when details are not provided.
- **Sensory Sensitivity:** Pays attention to how products feel on the skin, favoring those that do not cause irritation.
- **Preference for Tools:** Shows an interest in facial tools, such as massagers and rollers, indicating openness to exploring new skincare gadgets.
- **Practicality:** Appreciates multifunctionality, as seen in the enjoyment of the massager for lymphatic and sinus drainage, despite typically using different tools.

**Trends:**
- Emphasizes quality and effectiveness in skincare.
- Shows a willingness to try complementary products that enhance the skincare routine.
- Expresses satisfaction with products that deliver results despite some reservations about transparency.

Overall, the user demonstrates a keen interest in skincare, particularly products that enhance the under-eye area, balanced with a focus on value and ingredient transparency.
